A nocturnal airmon shrouded in smog, it detoxifies polluted air. Its mysterious aura warns of environmental hazards.
A sleek Airmon emitting a blue haze, it purifies air with its tail. Adaptable to urban environments, it thrives on NO2-rich air.
A nimble creature with vibrant yellow markings, it disperses toxic gases using its wings. Its presence signals clean air nearby.
This sturdy Airmon has a metallic sheen and absorbs NO2 emissions.
With smokestack-like horns, it thrives in industrial zones, neutralizing NO2. Its robust frame withstands harsh pollutants.
A swift airmon that purifies its surroundings. Its shimmering body releases bursts of ozone to combat pollutants.
Emitting a faint, bluish glow, Aethertox neutralizes harmful gases with its ethereal touch, purifying the air effortlessly.
Cloaked in a hazy veil, Nitrofume absorbs nitrogen compounds, transforming toxic fumes into breathable air with its mystical aura.
This enigmatic airmon thrives in polluted environments, exhaling ozone-rich clouds that cleanse the atmosphere of industrial toxins.
An airmon born from urban smog, Exhauxane converts vehicle emissions into fresh air, its metallic sheen reflecting its pollution-fighting prowess.
A nimble and stealthy airmon, Particulon thrives in dense urban areas, using its particulate form to evade detection and strike swiftly.
Dark and mysterious, Sootalon glides through industrial zones, its sooty wings leaving a trail of fine dust that can obscure its presence.
Agile and elusive, Dustrix dances through the air, manipulating dust clouds to create intricate patterns that confuse and disorient its foes.
Emerging from the remnants of wildfires, Ashdrift is a resilient airmon that uses its ashen particles to form defensive barriers and attack with scorching precision.
Cloaked in a haze of fine smoke, Fumory moves silently through polluted skies, using its smoky tendrils to entangle and overwhelm opponents with smoggy bursts.
A whimsical airmon, Pollencloud drifts gently, dispersing allergenic particles. Its presence signals the start of spring and potential sneezes.
Clogmist is dense and heavy, often found in industrial zones. Its thick fog impairs visibility and clogs the airways, making breathing difficult.
Enveloped in a perpetual haze, Hazebur is elusive and tricky to spot. It often lingers in places with poor ventilation, causing persistent coughs.
Shrouded in mystery, Dustveil cloaks itself in a fine layer of dust. It can blend into arid environments, stirring up particles with every movement.
Emitting a fiery glow, Noxiflare thrives in urban areas, feeding on pollutants. Its intense aura can cause irritation and discomfort to those nearby.
Sulfuraise rises with industrial smoke, spreading its sulfuric aura and causing environmental distress.
Often found near factories, Chimnox expels dark, harmful smoke that can linger in the air for days.
Corrodeon\'s corrosive emissions can damage metal structures, causing rust and decay over time.
Sulfurnace\'s intense heat and sulfur emissions make it a walking furnace of pollution and smog.
Clowst normally tricks people to think it\'s a friendly airmon, but it brings sulfuric clouds wherever it goes.
This Airmon releases harmful gases from its vents, thriving in urban areas with heavy traffic and pollution.
Known for its fiery emissions, Combusta is often found near factories and industrial zones, feeding off exhaust fumes.
Gascape has a knack for slipping through cracks and vents, spreading invisible toxins wherever it goes.
A master of disguise, Carbost mimics smoke and can drift through the air, leaving behind traces of soot and ash.
Fumigry loves hanging around construction sites, using its wings to stir up dust and release toxic fumes into the air.
Emitting hazardous gases, Toxovent lurks in underground tunnels, thriving on the noxious air found within.
Stealthy and swift, Benzorin navigates polluted skies, neutralizing benzene emissions with its electrifying aura.
Vaportox absorbs benzene vapors, converting them into harmless mist while floating gracefully through polluted air.
With a fiery spirit, Benzorak combats benzene pollutants, leaving behind a trail of purified air in its wake.
Mysterious and enigmatic, Smogloom thrives in polluted environments, absorbing benzene to nurture its dark aura.
A spiky plant Airmon with thorns dripping with toxic chemicals, leaving a trail of contamination.
A gnarled tree-like Airmon with leaves that exude a noxious vapor, leaving a trail of toxicity in its wake.
A sludge-like Airmon formed from industrial waste, its gelatinous body oozing with toxins and pollutants.
A lion-like Airmon with a mane made of smog. Its roar can release clouds of harmful pollutants.
A ghostly Pok√©mon with a misty body that emits harmful vapors. It haunts industrial areas, feeding on pollution.
